# CharacterControllerComponent.CollisionFlags

**Structure**

An option set that specifies which parts of the character capsule have collided with other objects.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CollisionFlags
```

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Initializes collisions flags from a raw value.

## Instance Properties

- **rawValue**: The bitmask representation of the option set.

## Type Properties

- **bottom**: The bottom of capsule was hit when moving in the down direction.
- **none**: No collision.
- **side**: The side of capsule was hit when moving in the direction tangent to the up vector.
- **top**: The top of capsule was hit when moving in the up direction.

## Character control

- **CharacterControllerComponent**: A component that manages character movement.
- **CharacterControllerComponent.Collision**: A container that holds collision state for the character controller.
- **CharacterControllerStateComponent**: A component that represents the state of a character controller.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- SetAlgebra
